headline: Valero Energy Corp (NYSE:VLO): A Bullish Investment Perspective
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Valero Energy Corp (VLO) on ValueInvestorsClub by Alejo Velez. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on VLO. VLO’s stock was trading at $151 when this thesis was published, vs. a closing price of $137.02 on November 12. VLO is one of the dominant leaders in the global […]
